item.title: DigitsOnTurbo: Optimizing Large Number Arithmetic Operations
item.description: This project is part of my M.Tech Thesis at IIT Gandhinagar, exploring optimizations for arithmetic operations on large numbers.

item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Hello there! I’m Subhrajit, a second-year M.Tech student at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar, India. I love Computer Science, especially Computer Systems. – শুভ্রজিৎ Skills I’m learning skills related to Computer Systems. Programming Language/Tools I Know Languages: C, C++, Java, MATLAB, Go, Python, R, Prolog, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSP, SQL, Kotlin Tools/Libraries/Simulators: Git, Bash, Wireshark, Docker, GDB, Valgrind, perf, AVX, OpenMP, MPI, gRPC, NS2, Mininet Operating Systems: Linux/Unix, Windows Hobbies Enjoying music Traveling Languages I Speak/Write বাংলা (Mother Tongue) हिंदी English संस्कृत (Learnt in School Curriculum) Feel free to explore my website to learn more about my work and projects.
